hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the soul of the Dark Link#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Market## has #10# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #the souls of the Deku Baba#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the soul of the Dark Link#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #9# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the souls of the Dead hand#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the souls of the Skulltula# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that there is an alcove with a Recovery Heart behind the lava wall in Dodongo's Cavern.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Stone of Agony#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the souls of the Flare Dancer# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Green Potion Bottle# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest
